name: Towers of Altera
description:
Developed by: 

Moishe Grosh - Sound Designer

Alex Spalvieri - Programmer

Gage Adam - Programmer

Andy Melo - Graphic Artist

You play as a defense contractor, hired by the King to fortify their lands from invading forces, using magic and money, you must build defensive structures and protect your kingdom!

Features:

  • Over Half a dozen unique tower designs
  • 10 Unique enemy types
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Easy to learn tutorial
